publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5463.1 Pauline McNeill: Scottish Development International Trade Mission to Israel—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5463) in the name of Sandra White, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to actively discourage this and any future trips until Israel complies with international law". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-5463.1 Scottish Development International Trade Mission to Israel (lodged on 12 January 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, Jim Hume*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Marlyn Glen*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Patrick Harvie*, Robin Harper*, Michael McMahon*, Jim Tolson*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-5463.1 Scottish Development International Trade Mission to Israel (lodged on 12 January 2010) Hugh Henry*
